detail.description: HIL Limited (HIL) is a part of the C.K. Birla Group and is headquartered in Hyderabad. It is one of the leading Companies in the building materials and construction industry with robust product pipeline and wide range. The company manufactures asbestos FC sheets, coloured steel sheets, non-asbestos corrugated roofing sheets, new generation building products like autoclaved aerated concrete (AAC) blocks (light bricks) that are used for walls in building constructions and aerocon panels and boards that are used as partition in residential and commercial buildings. [1]
